long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Beatport experience with this extension, designed to seamlessly mark your played tracks. Enjoy the added convenience of download and upload functionalities, allowing you to effortlessly retrieve a list of your played tracks and synchronize them with another computer. Now, your musical journey remains effortlessly connected and harmonized across devices.
